name: endpoint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the end of something or something that you are trying to achieve: I don't feel like I'm at an endpoint or even at a midpoint in my career. We’ve reached an acceptable endpoint in this litigation.

a result or event that must happen in order for an activity or project to be considered as having been successfully achieved: They changed the endpoint because they want to be able to analyze the data more quickly.
